name: First Friendship Institutional Baptist Church
description: The First Friendship Institutional Baptist Church (FFIBC) offers a place of worship as well as shelter for families. Breakfast and Dinner are provided, but there are no showers on site.
fullDescription: The First Friendship Institutional Baptist Church (FFIBC) offers a place of worship as well as shelter for families. Breakfast and Dinner are provided, but there are no showers on site.
